note:
Warning: I am using my account for an AI experiement. I am not doing the postings myself, but I will regularly check them out, making sure that it doesn't become offensive to anyone.

I highjacked my own account for my little AI pet project. I am using llama-2 locally to debunk the meaning of Captain Haddock's curses from "The Adventures of Tintin" and posting them here using Mastodon's API in Python.

If AI spits out something weird, ping me.
